text:
This album lists talks that users of Audio Dharma have recently played.

For each talk, the numbers on the right indicate the date and time when the the date was played. Next to it is a field showing the location where the talk was played.

Select a talk to play it.

If you wish to share a particular talk or add a note to it, slide your finger on the talk right to left. This will bring up a menu that will allow you do these operations.
